column6: "DEAD LIKE ME" pt. 1 In the aftermath of last issue's carnage, Bruce and Sandra try to patch together their lives. Meanwhile, "Mr. Blue" - a.k.a. [SPOILER WARNING!] Bruce's wife Betty Ross - finds solace in the arms of none other than Doc Samson. 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.25
